comment.note: Actor Johnny Simmons poses on the red carpet as he arrives for the premiere of "The Greatest" at the Linwood Dunn theater in Hollywood on March 25, 2010. The movie stars Pierce Brosnan and Susan Sarandon as Allen and Grace Brewer, a grief-stricken couple whose family has been pushed to the breaking point by the death of their older son, Bennett, in a car crash. AFP PHOTO/Mark RALSTON (Photo credit should read MARK RALSTON/AFP via Getty Images)
